Documentation of Hyper Casual Pack

In this package, we have created all the models separatedly, all the models are reuseable and it's depends upon us that how we can use and place in the environment.
we have created multiple props for this environment. You can use your own environment by using these props.
Models are made with Materials. In this Hyper Casual Pack included different animated Obstacles those you can use in your running game. The 3D Hyper Casual Pack consists of different objects created individually, so you can use them to create an intuitive and eye-catching 
user interface for your 3D game or animated video. The vectors can be edited and placed at any scene in the game/video to give it a more defined look.

We have different folders:
1) Material:
	Models are madeup with 15 Materials.
2) Models: 
	You will find models in Model folder.
3) Texture: 
	You will find 4 textures in this folder.
3) Prefabs: 
	All models have prefabs in the prefabs folder. 10 animated prefab obstacles are included in this pack. in this folder you will see different prefab folders with different props.
4) Scene: 
	Demo scene is included in this folder, you can see that we used all the props, animated obstacles and paths in this demo scene. we have created 2 levels as a starter templated for running game.
5) Documentation: 
	Read Me File.
6) Animation: 
	In this folder you will see all the animations and animators of different obstacles. 



All the prefabs are created, you can use each prefabs according to your environment needs. you just need to drag and drop each prefab whereever you want. you can create a big 
environment for your 3d running games and 3d animated Environment. Each objects are scable, you can transform and rotate each object.
